resources:
0 500
"AllTrans" "Loading List of Applications - Please Wait" "Please force-close the translated app! Translate Cache for this app will be erased next time the app starts!!" "Could not load the Per-app preference page. Close and re-open application again."
"App Icon" "Example Application" "Description"
"Translate Everywhere" "Apps to Translate" "Global Settings" "Instructions"
"Would you like to rate this app?" "Not now" "Never" "Submit Feedback" "Tell us where we can improve" "Submit" "Cancel"
"Translate Settings" "Translate Settings to Fix Apps Crashing or Not Translating" "Advanced Settings"
"Master On/Off" "Turn off to completely disable this module" "Module is turned off, no apps will be translated. Turn on to start using auto-translate!" "Module is turned on, selected apps will be translated. Turn off to completely disable this module."
translator_provider "Translation Service Provider" "Select which Translation Service to use - Google, Microsoft, or Yandex" "\nGoogle - This translation works offline, after initial download of around 30-60 MB. Translations are slow, makes apps \"lag\" or \"hang\" a bit. No need for any API key. Free.\n" "\nMicrosoft - Best translation, only works with Internet, requires a \"FREE\" API key. The process to get API keys is complicated, see Instructions.\n" "\nYandex - Requires a \"PAID\" api key. If you already have a free API key, it may work, it may not. Not recommended.\n "
"We need to download the translation files if not previously downloaded, around 30 MB. Translation will not work without downloading. Download now?" "Download now" "Cancel" "Downloading the translation files. Please wait" "Successfully Downloaded Translation Files" "Some Error in Downloading Translation Files"
"Microsoft / Yandex Subscription Key" "Microsoft Subscription Key" "Yandex Subscription Key" "Enter the Subscription Key for Microsoft Azure or Yandex Translation API, whichever is enabled above" "Enter Your Microsoft or Yandex Subscription Key"
"Translate From Language" "Language the app is originally in."
"Translate To Language" "Language you want the app to be translate into."
"Translate Normal Text" "Not Translating Text written using Set Text. Turn on to enable." "Translating Text written using Set Text - Safe. Turn off to disable."
"Translate Text Hints (Gray-Coloured Suggestions) in Text Boxes" "Not Translating Text written using Set Hint. Turn on to enable." "Translating Text written using Set Hint - Safe. Turn off to disable."
"Translate Text in Web Pages inside Apps" "Not Translating Text in WebViews. Turn on to enable." "Translating Text inside WebView - Safe, May Not Work Always. Turn off to disable."
"Translate Notifications (Unstable, May Crash)" "Not Translating Text in Notifications. Turn on to enable." "Translating Text inside Notifications - Unstable, May Crash Apps. Turn off to disable."
"Aggressive Mode" "Not aggressively translating Text in drawText. Use when all above fails. Turn on to enable." "Aggressively translating Text in drawText - Experimental, May Not Work Always. Turn off to disable."
"Use Caching" "Not saving translations offline, resulting in slower translate and higher data - But may work for more apps. Turn on to save translations." "Saving translations offline to speed up translate and use data. Turn off to disable if your app doesn't start."
"Delay Before Replacing with Translated Text" "Set the time in milliseconds to wait before replace with translated text. Default Value is 0. Set to 1000–5000 if the translated app is crashing."
"Delay Before Starting to Translate WebViews" "Set the time in milliseconds to wait before starting to translate WebViews. Default Value is 500. Set to 0 to increase translation speed. Set to 3000-5000 if part of web app are not translating."
"Scroll Long Translated Text" "Not scrolling translated text if it is too long. Text may be truncated, but will not interfere with the app's scrolling/clicking. Turn on to scroll long translations." "Scrolling translated text if it is too long. This may interfere with the app's scrolling/clicking. Turn off to disable this scrolling."
"Send Anonymous Crash and Usage Data" "Not sending anonymous crash and Usage data. Sending anonymous crash data helps the developer make the app better." "Sending anonymous crash and usage data. No personal information is transmitted. Anonymous crash data helps the developer make the app better"
"Advanced : Turn on Debug Mode." "Debug mode is off. Not writing debug data to logcat. Turn this on before sending error reports" "Debug mode is on. Writing logs to logcat. This decreases performance - turn off if not needed."
"Translate This App" "Turn off to stop translating this app" "This app will not translated. Turn on to start using auto-translate!" "This will be translated. Turn off to completely disable translating this app."
"OverRide Global Settings" "Using Global Settings for this app. Turn on to change settings only for this app." "Using Local Settings for this app. Turn off to use Global Settings."
"Click to clear Translation Cache" "Click the above to clear the app's translate cache. Use this after changing to/from languages, or if the app does not start."
